name: 抵御者 Defender
description:
！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！
Tip: The core of the gameplay is quick reaction blocking attacks,
so it is difficult, not easy to learn and even painful, buy carefully

What kind of game is this?


It's a fighting game - the enemy comes to you, defeat him, it's that simple.

It's a rhythmic game - you'll experience the thrill of constantly knocking back enemies.

Is this game difficult?


Simple - just press 3 buttons to easily fight.

Difficult - enemies with different moves bring different tests, you need to master with and defeat them



*Tip: The original intention of the game is to bring the most simple and refreshing feeling of battle, but it is based on the premise of mastering the rhythm of battle, so there is a certain degree of difficulty.

JiuBuTiLe works, thank you for playing my game.
